result.execSummary:
The defendant Synthera P Caston was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Business Setting <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(b).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Straight time if imposed.  5 days credit applied if revoked.

miscConds.notes: To be paid as a condition of probation.

Maintain full employment and/or combination of schooling.  Any term deemed appropriate by Agent. No contact with Montrell Goodvine and McDonald's located at 18695 W Bluemound Road, Brookfield, WI.  Obtain valid driver license. DNA Sample to be provided if not yet previously done. 
If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.  May terminate after 18 months upon recommendation by Agent.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Synthera P Caston in court with attorney Nicholas Martinez.  Michael Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
  The Defendant was sentenced to the following:

Count #1:

IMPOSED AND STAYED SENTENCE OF:   

6 MONTHS JAIL (CREDIT - 5 days if revoked);

TERM OF PROBATION:  2 YEARS; (Court would consider early termination after 18 months of probation upon recommendation by agent;

CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:  
*Maintain full time employment and/or combination of schooling 
*No contact with: Montrell Goodvine and McDonald's located at 18695 W. Bluemound Road, Brookfield, WI. 
*DNA sample to be provided if not yet previously done.
*Obtain valid drivers license.
*Any term deemed appropriate by agent.
*Perform 50 Hours of Community Service.

COURT COSTS:  $253.00 (apply cash bail and balance to be paid as a condition of probation);

DNA SURCHARGE:  $200.00 (to be paid as a condition of probation);

CONDITION TIME:20 DAYS, STAYED; to be used at agent's discretion.  Agent to determine with or without non working hours.  

Count #2:

IMPOSED AND STAYED SENTENCE OF:   

6 MONTHS JAIL, CONSECUTIVE TO COUNT #1;

TERM OF PROBATION:  2 YEARS; (Court would consider early termination after 18 months of probation upon recommendation by agent;

CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:  
*Maintain full time employment and/or combination of schooling 
*No contact with: Montrell Goodvine and McDonald's located at 18695 W. Bluemound Road, Brookfield, WI. 
*DNA sample to be provided if not yet previously done.
*Obtain valid drivers license.
*Any term deemed appropriate by agent.
*Perform 50 Hours of Community Service.

COURT COSTS:  $243.00 (to be paid as a condition of probation);

DNA SURCHARGE:  $200.00 (to be paid as a condition of probation);
Sentencing hearing on April 11, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Sentencing hearing on April 6, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
